resources.string: Let the Nature choose for you - A slot would be selected randomly using the principle of Quantum Superposition.
Please note that it may take 10-15 mins to get results from a real device due to limited availability but it would be truly random.
Something went wrong - Nature is playing a game with you
Enter a number to bet on
You won - Nature is with you this time!
You lost - Nature is against you this time!
Let the Nature chose it for you (For e.g: Should I go for a movie / outing, Which cuisine should I order? Be creative!)
Please enter a number to bet on
